title: Drama is...
creator_credit: Victoria. Audio-Visual Education Centre and Rob McCubbin
brief_description: To promote drama as a method which teachers should have in their armoury of skills. It shows how drama can be integrated into the total curriculum, and how it can be about coming to grips with real problems and about caring, sharing and understanding.
